Half-Life - это легендарная игра всей вселенной, даже самая первая часть игры стала легендой компании Valve, даже спустя столько лет тут геймплей хорош, мультиплеер к удивлению живой, графика не GTA 3 конечно, но очень прекрасна, ведь выглядит она целостно! И оптимизация идеальна! А сюжет тут про то как произошёл пипец в базе, но благо мы не как г0вн0 герой идти спасать мир, а идти наоборот спасать свою ж0пу и выбраться на свободу, правда хоть мы и помогаем учёным и охранникам по пути, но всё же. Рекомендую!

Crowbar smash the box real nice. Great 90's wonk and ambition. Fun for the whole town. 9.5/10

What a ride Half-Life is. Valve's design DNA was present from the beginning, everything that makes this game great is present in each of their following games. With how much I enjoyed it now, at the very end of 2020, I can't imagine what it must have been like to play for the first time 22 years ago.

There are a few minor things that aren't perfect, but I think my biggest complaint is the lack of music. There are some tracks sprinkled here and there, but for the most part the game is silent in this aspect. I'm guessing this might be because of disk/file space back in the day, or maybe I'm completely wrong about that. It's such an easy complaint to make because their modern games have such fantastic music and use it so well. Even an online FPS like TF2 has such a strong musical association with it. I will say though, being born just a couple years after the game came out, listening to the final credits track made me feel like a kid again, something about that era I guess.
yuh
this is not real

As someone who played this series the first time can honestly say that i now understand the hype and am now part of those who can't wait for the third installment. The only way to understand how the community feels is to play this masterpiece in which the game play is still fun and challenging for those who love FPS or  Sci-fi games.
This game is a classic! Its shooting is groundbreaking and i love the story to it! Certainly a A++ if you love zombie/alien shooting games!

Clunky as all shit and legitimately bad for most of the middle, the classic intro sequence spanning the first few hours inside the facility and the ending in Xen make this game worthwhile in my eyes, at least for one playthrough. Certainly an undeniable piece of gaming history and stands the test of time in terms of storytelling and pacing, but definitely too primitive in the gunplay department to really make it a favorite of mine like it seems to be for everyone else, especially considering how groundbreaking and otherworldly good HL2 is. Seriously, fighting those hitscan marines and the tanks and helicopters and shit is true pain. I dont even remember most of the plot because it takes place in the incredibly platforming-heavy and practically unplayable 7 or 8 hours in the middle.

So, aged kinda badly but not entirely. Still worth one go, I'd say. If this were like 5 hours shorter and had like 10% of the platforming that it does now it would handily be like the best shooter of the 90s. But it isnt, and it doesnt, and so you should be very careful when you play it. Make a quicksave like every 5 minutes or else you will hate your life. On a Rail made me legitimately suicidal. And the DLC suck!

A classic that never grows old. I am amazed at how much detail, story and interesting dialogue they packed into this game. Half-life still manages to get me jumpscared by those pesky headcrabs and it is testimony to how valve is still the masters at immersive storytelling and great level design.

猎头蟹不跑了，我也卡了很久，其实往前多一个档重来就好了
还有跳飞石那部分不能远跳（蹲+跳）那是因为键位冲突，把蹲改个键就好了
总的来说，这是v社大礼包中必玩的

Es un juego del año 1998, un poco viejo pero se siente como un juego AAA como los de hoy en dia, para algunos jugadores jovenes que estan acostumbrados a graficos como los de hoy en dia se pueden asustar un poco, pero hacerme caso, vale la pena comprarse este juego.Lo unico malo que encuentro del juego son las peleas con los bosses, son un poco aburridas y tienes que hacer muchas cosas, por lo demas esta muy bien, ademas esta muy barato.Ta bueno compralo. 9/10

Okay so without spoilers, I know how old the game is but I only just played it yesterday and today

It's thrilling you keep moving forward wanting to see whats next and where the problem is.

Then surrealist nightmare hellscape, IT IS A HORROR GAME you will be on edge constantly

I don't normally like that in a game I prefer lulls in the action and tension, this game was good enough to get past that. Well done valve.

Вы показали, что можете принимать благоразумные решения, поэтому я думаю, что вы не доставите особых проблем. Если вы заинтересовались моим предложением — просто станьте в портал, что даст мне считать ваш ответ положительным. В противном случае… Что ж… Я могу предложить вам битву, в которой у вас не будет шансов на победу. Это довольно разочаровывающая перспектива после всего того, что вам пришлось пережить.
This game, even in 2020, still stands as one of my favorites. The gameplay is still perfect, and i am still scared of the headcrabs. Great game!
